To the chief Musician<S>5329</S>, A Psalm<S>4210</S> for the sons<S>1121</S> of Korah<S>7141</S>. O clap<S>8628</S> your hands<S>3709</S>, all ye people<S>5971</S>; shout<S>7321</S> unto God<S>430</S> with the voice<S>6963</S> of triumph<S>7440</S>. <sup>for: or, of</sup>
For the LORD<S>3068</S> most high<S>5945</S> is terrible<S>3372</S>; he is a great<S>1419</S> King<S>4428</S> over all the earth<S>776</S>.
He shall subdue<S>1696</S> the people<S>5971</S> under us, and the nations<S>3816</S> under our feet<S>7272</S>.
He shall choose<S>977</S> our inheritance<S>5159</S> for us, the excellency<S>1347</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> whom he loved<S>157</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
God<S>430</S> is gone up<S>5927</S> with a shout<S>8643</S>, the LORD<S>3068</S> with the sound<S>6963</S> of a trumpet<S>7782</S>.
Sing praises<S>2167</S> to God<S>430</S>, sing praises<S>2167</S>: sing praises<S>2167</S> unto our King<S>4428</S>, sing praises<S>2167</S>.
For God<S>430</S> is the King<S>4428</S> of all the earth<S>776</S>: sing ye praises<S>2167</S> with understanding<S>7919</S>. <sup>with: or, every one that hath</sup>
God<S>430</S> reigneth<S>4427</S> over the heathen<S>1471</S>: God<S>430</S> sitteth<S>3427</S> upon the throne<S>3678</S> of his holiness<S>6944</S>.
The princes<S>5081</S> of the people<S>5971</S> are gathered together<S>622</S>, even the people<S>5971</S> of the God<S>430</S> of Abraham<S>85</S>: for the shields<S>4043</S> of the earth<S>776</S> belong unto God<S>430</S>: he is greatly<S>3966</S> exalted<S>5927</S>. <sup>princes: or, voluntary of the people are gathered unto the people of the God of Abraham</sup>
